channel.title: rawsanj on Cloud Native Things
channel.description: Recent content in rawsanj on Cloud Native Things

item.description: Sanjay Rawat is a Full-stack Cloud Developer at Capgemini. His interests includes Micro-services, Serverless Architecture, Containers and loves building things using languages like Java, Kotlin, Node.js. He is AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional and has successfully completed the Pivotal Platform Acceleration Labs program.
